name: Lodestone
effect:
The Anchor becomes SLOWED and creates a Burst 3 area of gravitomagnetic interference until the end of its next turn. While active, hostile characters in the area are SLOWED and cannot teleport into or out of the area.

Allied characters within the area are not valid targets for ranged attacks. Other characters with LODESTONE are unaffected by this system.

name: Lodestone
effect: On Attack: Choose to either Attract or Repulse.
on_hit: The target must pass a HULL save or be pulled 3 spaces directly towards the Anchor (Attract) or pushed 3 spaces directly away from the Anchor (Repulse) until they hit an obstruction. If the target collides with an obstruction, they are knocked PRONE.

name: Lodestone
effect: The Anchor has RESISTANCE to all damage from attacks that originate beyond Range 3.

name: Reality Anchor
effect: All characters affected by LODESTONE gain IMMUNITY to INTANGIBLE. In addition, they may target and affect INTANGIBLE characters and objects, and they may be targeted and affected by INTANGIBLE characters.

name: Omninet Grounding
effect: Allied characters affected by LODESTONE are not valid targets for tech actions.

name: Newtonian Amplifier
effect: The Anchor creates a Line 8 path of gravitic energy. All characters within the path or above it must pass a HULL save or first be IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn and then knocked PRONE.

name: Magnetic Reversal
trigger: An allied character in the Anchor’s SENSORS takes damage from a ranged attack.
effect: The allied character gains RESISTANCE to all damage from the attack, and the attacker must pass a HULL save or be pushed 3 spaces away from their target and knocked PRONE.

name: Null-Grav Motivator
effect: The Anchor creates three Blast 1 areas in SENSORS extending 6 spaces high. These areas become zero-g areas that last until the Anchor uses this system again. Characters within the areas upon their creation must pass an AGILITY save or be IMPAIRED until the end of their next turn.

name: Marathon Arquebus
effect:
Allied characters in the affected area are not attacked, but instead gain OVERSHIELD {2/4/6}.

The Capacitor gains OVERSHIELD equal to the number of characters damaged or granted OVERSHIELD by this weapon.

name: Arc Feedback
trigger: A hostile character causes an allied character in SENSORS to lose all OVERSHIELD.
effect: The hostile character takes {2/4/6} Energy damage and is IMPAIRED until the end of their next turn.

name: Purifying Lightning
effect: Allies affected by the MARATHON ARQUEBUS may clear up to one condition.

name: Deflecting Shot
trigger: An allied character in SENSORS is hit by an attack.
effect: The Capacitor first BARRAGES with the MARATHON ARQUEBUS. The triggering allied character must be included in the attack’s area.

name: Quickening Bolt
effect: Choose one character within SENSORS. The target gains OVERSHIELD {4/6/8}. Until the target loses all OVERSHIELD, they may BOOST as a free action.

name: Cyclic Discharge
effect: The Capacitor loses all OVERSHIELD. Its next weapon attack deals bonus damage equal to the OVERSHIELD lost.

name: Amplifier Drone
effect:
Amplifier Drone (Size 1/2, HP {5/10/15}, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone)

This drone can be deployed to a space within SENSORS and line of sight. While deployed, it projects a Burst 2 electrified area. Allied characters in the area that gain any OVERSHIELD increase the amount gained by +2. Hostile characters that enter the area or end their turn there receive LOCK ON and cease to be INVISIBLE or HIDDEN.

name: Phase Shift
effect: This character is INTANGIBLE on their turn. While INTANGIBLE, they can target and affect tangible characters and objects, but only deal half damage, Heat, Burn or to all targets.

name: Paradox State
effect: While this effect lasts, the Ghost becomes INTANGIBLE and enters one space occupied by tangible adjacent character. The Ghost moves with the target’s voluntary movement. As a protocol, the target may take 2 Heat to gain the Ghost’s PHASE SHIFT feature until the end of their turn. If either character takes Heat or receives any condition, the other character receives the same amount of Heat and gains that condition for the same duration. This effect lasts until the Ghost no longer shares a space with the target, or until the Ghost is STUNNED, JAMMED, overheated, or destroyed.

name: Quantum Bond
effect: The Ghost targets a character affected by PARADOX STATE. The next time a hostile action is taken against the target, roll 1d6: On a 4+, the target is INTANGIBLE during the action. This effect does not stack with INVISIBLE.

name: Superimpose Firmament
effect: The Ghost projects a Burst 2 area of Firmament energy. All tangible characters, objects, terrain, and sitrep objectives are INTANGIBLE while within the area (so INTANGIBLE characters can interact with sitrep objectives within and tangible ones cannot). The area lasts until the end of the Ghost’s next turn.

name: String Theory Marionette
effect: The Ghost targets a character affected by PARADOX STATE. The target may either SKIRMISH or use QUICK TECH as a reaction, dealing half damage, Heat, Burn or to all targets.

name: Wavefunction Collapse
trigger: A hostile action is taken against a character affected by PARADOX STATE.
effect: The Ghost may first use QUANTUM BOND.

name: Spectral Flight
effect: Characters affected by PHASE SHIFT may treat all of their movement as flying.

name: Split Timestream
trigger: A character affected by PARADOX STATE would take structure damage or stress.
effect: The triggering character instead regains all HP and clears all Heat, and the Ghost takes the structure damage or stress instead.

name: Cleaving Retrieval
effect: When the Hatchet retrieves a THROWN weapon, all adjacent hostile characters must pass an AGILITY save or take {3/4/5} Kinetic damage and become SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Flip Kick
effect: One adjacent character must pass a HULL save or be pushed 2 spaces away from the Hatchet and knocked PRONE. Regardless of the result, the Hatchet flies 2 spaces away from the target.

name: Whirlwind Kick
effect: Adjacent hostile characters must pass a HULL save or be pushed 2 spaces away from the Hatchet and be IMPAIRED until the end of their next turn.

name: Plasma Knife
effect: When retrieving this weapon, CLEAVING RETRIEVAL’S damage becomes AP.

name: Monomolecular Throwing Axe
on_hit: The target must pass a HULL save or be IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Reckless Dive
trigger: A ranged or THROWN melee attack hits the Hatchet.
effect: The Hatchet interrupts the attack, moves up to its SPEED directly towards the attacker, and makes an attack against them. If this attack hits, the Hatchet gains RESISTANCE to all damage from the triggering attack.

name: Return to Sender
trigger: The Hatchet is targeted by a THROWN melee attack or would be affected by a GRENADE.
effect: Roll 1d6. On a 4+, the attack or grenade is negated. If an attack was negated, the Hatchet repeats the attack against the attacker. If a grenade was negated, the Hatchet may throw the same grenade, targeting a space occupied by the grenade’s original controller. These effects ignore any range restrictions upon the triggering effect.

name: Champion’s Greatsword
effect: On Critical Hit: The target gains LOCK ON.

name: Compelled Duel
effect:
A hostile character within SENSORS and line of sight must pass a SYSTEMS save or enter a duel with the Knight. Characters in a duel receive +3 Difficulty on all attacks that don’t include their opponent as a target and cannot voluntarily move away from each other. If a dueling character makes any attack against their opponent, these effects cease for them until the start of their next turn.

The duel lasts until the end of the scene or until one of the opponents is destroyed. Each character cannot enter another duel until the end of this duel.

name: Punishing Blow
trigger: The Knight’s duel opponent takes a hostile action that doesn’t include the Knight as a target.
effect: The Knight SKIRMISHES the triggering character, knocking them PRONE on a hit.

name: Hero’s Banner
effect:
Hero’s Banner (Size 1/2, HP {10/20/30}, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Deployable)

As a quick action, deploy a banner that projects a Burst 3 area in an adjacent space. Allied characters within the area gain RESISTANCE to all damage. If this banner is destroyed, allied characters in the area are SHREDDED until the end of their next turn.

name: Sweeping Blows
effect: When attacking with the CHAMPION’S GREATSWORD, the Knight may choose to attack in a Cone 3 area.

name: Templar’s Shield
effect: The Knight raises a shield, gaining RESISTANCE to all damage from its duel opponent until the end of its next turn.

name: Second Wind
effect: The Knight regains half of its HP and clears one condition. The Knight can take this action even if it would be prevented from taking actions on its turn.

name: Mighty Throw
effect: The Knight throws an adjacent character. If the target is an ally, they are pushed 5 spaces away from the Knight. If the target is hostile, they must pass a HULL save or be pushed 3 spaces away from the Knight and knocked PRONE.
